categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (Sd Alcohol 39-C), Fragrance, Water, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Limonene, Coumarin, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral, Geraniol, Farnesol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: you get 100ml bottle plus a huge duffle bag for the same price as just the bottle alone. This is a great deal for a xmas gift, this scent always sells out.
